wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Ward (born 4 April 1970]) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a midfielder. Ward started his career as a youth player at Everton before signing on loan for Doncaster Rovers in 1988 where he made his Football League debut. He made 4 league appearances for Doncaster Rovers and 1 in the FA Cup before signing for Wigan Athletic the following season.
